org.smooks.api.delivery

Interface ReaderPool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultReaderPool, DynamicReaderPool

    public interface ReaderPool

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XMLReader borrowXMLReader()
      Get an XMLReader instance from the reader pool associated with this ContentDelivery config instance.
      void returnXMLReader(XMLReader xmlReader)
      Return an XMLReader instance to the reader pool associated with this ContentDelivery config instance.

    • Method Detail

      • borrowXMLReader

        XMLReader borrowXMLReader()
        Get an XMLReader instance from the reader pool associated with this ContentDelivery config instance.
        Returns:
        An XMLReader instance if the pool is not empty, otherwise null.

      • returnXMLReader

        void returnXMLReader(XMLReader xmlReader)
        Return an XMLReader instance to the reader pool associated with this ContentDelivery config instance.
        Parameters:
        xmlReader - The XMLReader instance to be returned. If the pool is full, the instance is left to the GC (i.e. lost).
